Value:

do { \
  try { check_##_server_(conn_mgr, wait_ms); } catch (Exception &e) { \
    if (verbose) { \
      HT_DEBUG_OUT << e << HT_END; \
      cout << #_server_ <<" - down" << endl; \
    } \
    ++down; \
    break; \
  } \
  if (verbose) cout << #_server_ <<" - up" << endl; \
} while (0)
